content: perf rlo only needs rustc, cargo and rustdoc, right? I want to do a try build without rust-analyzer
yeah, though most of the current try time is taken by rebuilds of LLVM and the like -- need to get sccache to cache PGO builds properly to avoid some of that.
it's not about try speed in this case. not having to build rust-analyzer submodule makes dependency patching easier because vendoring in dist otherwise blows up.
